The Officer reviewed publicly available SSO information, which did not require disclosure under procedural fairness
No breach of procedural fairness occurred
evidence_assessment: The Officer expressed concerns about SSO contributions and requested corroborating evidence
The Applicant provided a letter stating he was exempt from SSO contributions but offered no additional proof

immigration_status: Applicant's PR application was refused due to insufficient evidence of work experience
